page.title: 19Revidge Fold Church
page.content: Revidge Fold United Reformed Church was formed in 1974, after divine guidance through prayer, of a union of St George's and Four Lane Ends Churches. Two years later a new wing was added, providing a major additional hall, stage, lounge, kitchen and chapel area. Activities provide regular Christian worship for adults and young people,including ministry of healing and wholeness; eight groups meet regularly for Bible Study and prayer, either on the premises or in private homes; three other fellowships are run for men and women, plus two more for children and teenagers, based on religious instruction. Four uniformed sections of the Scout/Guide movement are associated; there is badminton, a drama group, a modern religious music group and a traditional choir.
